scripts.watch: npm run build & onchange 'src/**/*.ts' '*.ts' -- npm run build
scripts.clean: find ./src -name "*.js" -type f -delete & rm *.js & rm -rf dist/ && mkdir dist
scripts.manual:compile: tsc && tsc addons.ts && rm src/*.js && rm src/addons/*.js
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run browserify && cp colors-catalog.js dist/
scripts.demo: cp colors-catalog.js docs/ && npm run start
scripts.demo-build: npm run dist && cp colors-catalog.js docs/
scripts.demo-full: npm run dist && npm run demo
